summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5648 for the improvement of East 45th Street (both sides), from Sand Point Way to 43rd Avenue Northeast, and from 50th Avenue Northeast to 51st Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74452, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
